metadata.feature_description: Allows users to subscribe to files and folders for notifications on changes

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Assets > My Website
steps.expected: Assets panel displays folders and files
steps.actual: Assets panel displayed with folders (Badges, Images, Templates, TestFolder01, Users) and files

steps.action: Click edit icon on test_image.png file to open file details
steps.expected: File details panel opens with Subscribe toggle visible
steps.actual: File details panel opened showing Subscribe toggle set to Off, with file metadata and editing options

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to enable subscription
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle changes to On state
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to On state, file subscription activated

steps.action: Click edit icon on Images folder to open folder details
steps.expected: Folder details panel opens with Subscribe toggle visible
steps.actual: Folder details panel opened showing Subscribe toggle set to Off, along with workflow and versioning options

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to enable subscription
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle changes to On state
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to On state, folder subscription activated

steps.action: Open file details for test_image.png again
steps.expected: File details show Subscribe toggle still On (persisted)
steps.actual: File details opened with Subscribe toggle showing On state, confirming persistence

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to disable subscription
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle changes to Off state
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to Off state, file unsubscribed

steps.action: Open folder details for Images folder again
steps.expected: Folder details show Subscribe toggle still On (persisted)
steps.actual: Folder details opened with Subscribe toggle showing On state, confirming persistence

steps.action: Click Subscribe toggle to disable subscription
steps.expected: Subscribe toggle changes to Off state
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle changed to Off state, folder unsubscribed

steps.action: While subscribed to Images folder, observe notification popups
steps.expected: Notifications appear when changes occur in subscribed folder
steps.actual: Notification popup appeared: 'A new folder has been added into Images' and 'A new file has been added to the folder... The file test_image3.png has been added to the folder /Images/'

steps.action: Close file details panel and reopen it
steps.expected: Subscribe state persists after closing and reopening panel
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle retained On state after closing panel, confirming subscription persistence

steps.action: Close folder details panel and reopen it
steps.expected: Subscribe state persists after closing and reopening panel
steps.actual: Subscribe toggle retained On state after closing panel, confirming subscription persistence

observations: Subscription toggle is accessible through file/folder details panel via the edit icon
Subscriptions are persisted immediately upon toggle change without requiring explicit save
Notification system actively delivers real-time notifications for subscribed content changes
Both file-level and folder-level subscriptions are supported
Folder subscriptions trigger notifications for changes to files within that folder
